name: Lazerball
description:
The Game:
In a dystopian future, health and safety laws are forgotten, and contestants from around the world battle it out in a new and emerging underground sport!

With quick frantic rounds and feel good gameplay, this high energy game is a must for local competitive fun with friends.
Also, with Steam Remote Play Together, you can stream your game and play with up to 8 people, with no need to set up servers or wait for the perfect number of
players to join a room, just call up your mates and play and stream instantly.



  • Short brutal rounds
  • Ever moving ball
  • Powerups for added chaos



  • Aim with your analogue stick for precise shots!
  • Curve the ball after you've hit it for added accuracy!
  • Freeze mid-air and ready your shot for the perfect return!



  • A host of unique quirky characters to choose from!
  • 4 Different Gamemodes! (Original, Points, Marksman, & Goals)
  • Play in a team of 4v4, 3v3, 2v2 or play PvP, all against all!
  • Many music tracks to choose from, ranging from D&B & Techno, to Breakbeat & House!




Stay Tuned! More Characters and Stages are in the works!
If you want to keep this on the radar, I'd love if you could Wishlist, and check out my other socials for regular updates.
